title: kaN pArAyO
sahitya:
kaN pArAyO enran kali tIrAyO


anupallavi

  maN vENDi kuraLAgi vaNamura vanda emmAn viNNOr
 pOTriDa maNNOr viyandiDa viraindu uyarndu nirainda nI


caraNam    alai kaDalADinEn un malai ErinEn valam vandu nin kOvil karam kUppinEn malar tUvi tiru
 mantiram magizndOdinEn nalam tarum nin kazhal aham koNDu nAraNA AtkoL enriDum enranaik-
